favourite.article: Living isn't worth it if you haven't got Life. Lord give us your Life!
Touch the living Jesus instead! Oh thank You Lord we can turn to You simply by calling on Your name!
Lord! we call on You! Thus You can call upon us!
Get out of your mind, get your spirit in gear... that's the way to get to Jesus from here.

This song tells us that we should call on Jesus' name because we need him. Also, that we should just forget all our concepts... we just need to call O LORD JESUS!!! This is one of the songs I just started singing while browsing through here, I like this song a lot and I sing it with other kids in the 6th grade at my age. Amen Saints!
I love this song for the Lord is are life and we are here for him. The Lord sacrificed so much just for us, it shows how much he cares for his sons. We are the children of God "Hallelujah!"
I like this song because it is strong and spiritual.
I love this so because it's so true. We need to call on the Lord all the time. Without calling on the Lord we dead in the spirit or when we don't we just turn to the Lord and say O LORD JESUS!
